title: Amnesty International ‘concerned about’ reports from #Rambukkana
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Global Human Rights Defender Amnesty International states that it is concerned about disturbing reports after Police opened fire at protestors in Rambukkana today (19).
Moreover, Amnesty International has emphasized that authorities must always exercise restraint and use no more force than necessary.
Multi-disciplinary group of leading professionals call for President, PM resignation
